languages.text: Спустя десятилетия технодознаватель Медный шепот столкнулся с картелем хладных торговцев, попиравших регалии Механикус, и предал казни влиятельную преступницу по имени Торра. Убийство это повергло в скорбь и ярость Джай Хейдари. В отместку был жестоко убит магос Авель Ханейманн, чистосердный и безобидный слуга Омниссии.

Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Adeptus Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.
languages.original_text: Спустя десятилетия технодознаватель Медный шепот столкнулся с картелем хладных торговцев, попиравших регалии Механикус, и предал казни влиятельную преступницу по имени Торра. Убийство это повергло в скорбь и ярость Джай Хейдари. В отместку был жестоко убит магос Авель Ханейманн, чистосердный и безобидный слуга Омниссии.

traits.locale_text: Decades later, techno-interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of cold traders who had defiled the Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

Decades later, techno-interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of cold traders who had defiled the Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Adeptus Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

languages.text: 几十年后，技术审讯官铜语审讯了某个冷市商人的犯罪组织，还处决了一个叫托菈的罪犯头目，罪名是玷污了机械修会的主权。这样的行为让婕伊·海达利陷入了悲痛与愤怒之中，为了进行报复，她派人暗杀了欧姆尼塞亚的仆从亚伯·哈努曼贤者，那是个心地纯洁、人畜无害的人。
languages.original_text: Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Adeptus Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: 几十年后，技术审讯官铜语审讯了某个冷市商人的犯罪组织，还处决了一个叫托菈的罪犯头目，罪名是玷污了机械神教的主权。这样的行为让婕伊·海达利陷入了悲痛与愤怒之中，为了进行报复，她派人暗杀了欧姆尼塞亚的仆从亚伯·哈努曼贤者，那是个心地纯洁、人畜无害的人。

languages.text: 数十年後、テック・インテロゲイターのブラスウィスパーは帝国技術局の特権を汚した闇商人のカルテルと対峙し、トーラという強力な罪人を処刑した。この行いはジェイ・ヘイダリを深く悲しませ、また激しく怒らせた。その報復として、彼女は万機神の純真で無害なしもべであるマゴス・アベル・ヘニュマンの暗殺を企てた。
languages.original_text: Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Adeptus Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: 数十年後、テック・インテロゲイターのブラスウィスパーは帝国技術局の特権を汚した闇商人のカルテルと対峙し、トーラという強力な罪人を処刑した。この行いはジェイ・ヘイダリを深く悲しませ、また激しく怒らせた。その報復として、彼女は万機神の純真で無害なしもべであるマゴス・アベル・ヘニュマンの暗殺を企てた。

languages.text: Des décennies plus tard, le techno-interrogateur Murmecuivre affronta un cartel spécialisé dans le Commerce Froid, qui avait profané les insignes de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, et exécuta une puissante criminelle du nom de Torra. Cet acte plongea Jae Heydari dans un état de tristesse et de rage. En représailles, elle organisa l'assassinat du magos Abel Haneumann, un inoffensif serviteur au cœur pur de l'Omnimessie.
languages.original_text: Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Adeptus Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Des décennies plus tard, le techno-interrogateur Murmecuivre affronta un cartel spécialisé dans le Commerce Froid, qui avait profané les insignes de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, et exécuta une puissante criminelle du nom de Torra. Cet acte plongea Jae Heydari dans un état de tristesse et de rage. En représailles, elle organisa l'assassinat du magos Abel Haneumann, un inoffensif serviteur au cœur pur de l'Omnimessie.

languages.text: Décadas después, la tecnointerrogadora Susurro de Latón se enfrentó a un cártel de Comerciantes Fríos que habían profanado las vestimentas del Adeptus Mechanicus y ejecutó a una poderosa criminal llamada Torra. Esto llevó a Jae Heydari a hundirse en el dolor y la ira. En venganza, organizó el asesinato del Magos Abel Haneumann, un sirviente del Omnissiah inofensivo y de corazón puro.
languages.original_text: Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Adeptus Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Décadas después, la tecnointerrogadora Susurro de Latón se enfrentó a un cártel de Comerciantes Fríos que habían profanado las vestimentas del Mechanicus y ejecutó a una poderosa criminal llamada Torra. Esto llevó a Jae Heydari a hundirse en el dolor y la ira. En venganza, organizó el asesinato del magos Abel Haneumann, un sirviente del Omnissiah inofensivo y de corazón puro.

languages.text: Jahrzehnte später stellte Tech-Interrogator Messingflüsterer ein Kartell von Kalthändlern, die die Adeptus-Mechanicus-Insignien entweiht hatten, und richtete eine mächtige Kriminelle namens Torra hin. Diese Tat stürzte Jae Heydari in Kummer und Zorn. Als Vergeltung arrangierte sie die Ermordung von Magos Abel Haneumann, einem warmherzigen und harmlosen Diener des Omnissiah.
languages.original_text: Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Adeptus Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Jahrzehnte später stellte Tech-Interrogator Messingflüsterer ein Kartell von Kalthändlern, die die Mechanicus-Insignien entweiht hatten, und richtete eine mächtige Kriminelle namens Torra hin. Diese Tat stürzte Jae Heydari in Kummer und Zorn. Als Vergeltung arrangierte sie die Ermordung von Magos Abel Haneumann, einem warmherzigen und harmlosen Diener des Omnissiah.

languages.text: Tekno Sorgucu Pirinçfısıltı, on yıllar sonra Adeptus Mechanicus mensupluğunu hiçe sayan bir Soğuk Tacir kartelinin karşısına çıktı ve Torra isimli güçlü bir suçluyu infaz etti. Bu olay, Jae Heydari'yi kedere ve öfkeye boğdu. Jae, misilleme olarak Hermesih'in saf yürekli ve zararsız hizmetkârı Magos Abel Haneumann'a suikast düzenledi.
languages.original_text: Decades later, Tech-Interrogator Brasswhisper confronted a cartel of Cold Traders who had defiled the Adeptus Mechanicus regalia and executed a powerful criminal named Torra. This act plunged Jae Heydari into grief and rage. In retaliation, she arranged the assassination of Magos Abel Haneumann, a pure-hearted and harmless servant of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Tekno Sorgucu Pirinçfısıltı, on yıllar sonra Adeptus Mechanicus'a dâhil oluşunu hiçe sayan bir Soğuk Tacir kartelinin karşısına çıktı ve Torra isimli güçlü bir suçluyu infaz etti. Bu olay Jae Heydari'yi kedere ve öfkeye boğdu. Misilleme olarak Hermesih'in saf yürekli ve zararsız hizmetkârı Magos Abel Haneumann'a suikast düzenledi.
